prompt:
[INST]You are a topic labelling assistant. Given the following text:

world
sports
business
science/technology?[/INST]

prompt.question:

world
sports
business
science/technology?

Text: {text}
Label: [/INST]

prompt:

sports
business & finance
entertainment & music
family & relationships
politics & government
[/INST]

prompt:
[INST]You are a text category annotator. Given the following text:
{title}
{content}
Given a list of categories: 
company, 
educational institution, 
artist, 
athlete, 
office holder, 
mean of transportation, 
building, 
natural place, 
village, 
animal, 
plant, 
album, 
film, 
written work. 
Which category does this text belong to?[/INST]

prompt.instruction: [INST]You are a categorizing assistant. Given a title and a description, you need to determine which category does the title belong to.
prompt.question:
Which category does this belong to among: 
company, 
educational institution, 
artist, 
athlete, 
office holder, 
mean of transportation, 
building, 
natural place, 
village, 
animal, 
plant, 
album, 
film, 
written work
?

Title: {title}
Description: {content}
Label: [/INST]

prompt:

économie, 
opinion, 
politique, 
société, 
culture, 
sport, 
environnement, 
technologie, 
éducation, 
justice 
?[/INST]

prompt.instruction: [INST]Tu es un assistant de classification de thème. Basé sur un titre et un texte, tu dois prédire le thème dont ce texte parle.
prompt.question:
Ce texte parle de quel thème parmi: 
économie, 
opinion, 
politique, 
société, 
culture, 
sport, 
environnement, 
technologie, 
éducation, 
justice
? 
Titre: {title}
Texte: {summary}
Thème: [/INST]

cultura,

tecnologia

Texto: {summary}
